algorithm_technique: List comprehension with nested loops for expansion
problem_summary_simple: Expand a list compressed with run-length encoding by repeating values based on frequencies.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through pairs of frequency and value in the input list, expanding each pair into a sublist and concatenating them.
key_insights: The input list is structured as [freq1, val1, freq2, val2, ...].
A list comprehension provides a concise way to generate the expanded list.
The space complexity is O(1) if we consider the output list not part of the auxiliary space.
